info.pavie.opennetworkmap.model.draw

Class RepresentableEdge

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.pavie.opennetworkmap.model.draw.RepresentableEdge

  • public class RepresentableEdge
extends java.lang.Object
    A representable edge is an Edge which can be drawn using a RepresentableNetwork. It is based on RepresentableVertex, and works similarly as Vertex and Edge.
    Author:
    Adrien PAVIE
